text: they are a fashion institution he is a
music icon but now these global
heavyweights have had a big falling out
the spat was sparked by a magazine
interview in which Domenico Dolce's said
creating children must be an act of love
adding you are born to a mother and a
father or at least that's how it should
be I call children of chemistry
synthetic children this didn't sit well
with Sir Elton he and husband David
Furnish have two children born through
IVF he hit back on Instagram saying how
dare you refer to my beautiful children
as synthetic it went on your archaic
thinking is out of step with the times
just like your fashions I shall never
wear Dolce & Gabbana ever again
and ended with the hashtag boycott Dolce
& Gabbana celebrities have backed the
call pop star Ricky Martin says your
voices are too powerful to be spreading
so much hate wake up it's 2015 former
tennis star Martina Navratilova tweeted
right on Elton and David my DNG shirts
are going in the bin celebrity blogger
Perez Hilton whose son was born by a
surrogate mother said because I choose
to spend my money wisely and not support
self hating gays who view my son is
synthetic hashtag boycott Dolce and
Gabbana and rocker Courtney Love shared
a collage on Instagram saying I just
round up all my Dolce and Gabanna items
and want to burn them I'm just beyond
words and emotions boycott senseless
bigotry
the designers love mums even basing
their last show at Milan Fashion Week on
motherhood clearly taken aback by the
reaction responding to the criticism
Domenico Dolce said he'd only been
expressing his own opinions and hadn't
meant to judge the decisions of others
after decades of being a celebrity
fashion favorite Dolce & Gabbana will be
hoping their traditional view on
families doesn't tarnish their modern
luxury image Christina's RH BBC news
